original_text:
What more was there to do for my vineyard,
    that I have not done in it?
When I looked for it to yield grapes,
    why did it yield wild grapes?
korean_text: 내가 내 포도원을 위하여 행한 것 외에 무엇을 더할 것이 있으랴 내가 좋은 포도 맺기를 기다렸거늘 들포도를 맺음은 어찌 됨인고

sentences.original_text: What more was there to do for my vineyard
sentences.korean_translation: 내 포도원을 위해 더 무엇을 할 수 있었을까

sentences.original_text: that I have not done in it?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 안에서 하지 않은 일이 무엇이었을까?

sentences.original_text: When I looked for it to yield grapes
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그것이 포도를 맺기를 기대했을 때

sentences.original_text: why did it yield wild grapes?
